review_text: Works great for small jobs including powdering some spices.  I also flip the blade over and shred onions with it.  If you fill it up too full it will not work well.  Remember this is not the full-size model.  It is also very easy to clean up.  no hard to clean nooks and crannies.
product_name: Cuisinart DLC-1 Mini-Prep Food Processor, White
